tool_prompt.description: Present a plan to the user for approval before execution. This tool is used when you need to outline a series of steps or actions you intend to take, allowing the user to review and approve the plan before proceeding.

parameter.name: plan
parameter.description: The plan to present to the user, formatted in markdown

example.title: Present a refactoring plan
example.command:
{"plan": "## Refactoring Plan

1. **Extract common logic** - Move duplicated code to utility functions
2. **Update imports** - Adjust all import statements
3. **Run tests** - Ensure no functionality is broken
4. **Update documentation** - Reflect the new structure"}
